description:
Welcome to the course on "Basic concepts of Biology"

Biology is the scientific study of life. In this course you will learn the general concepts of Biology from two complementary perspectives. You will gain the knowledge you need for academic and professional development and to learn how Biology relates to day to day living.

At the end of this course, I hope that you will have the material you need to meet your educational goals. I also hope that this course will enhance your appreciation for the study of life on our planet.

Pictures are attached to explore the concepts briefly.

Course is subdivided into several parts

After studying this course student will be able to understand the basics concepts of biology in detail.

So we will cover!

  • Branches of Biology ,Cellular Organization, Biological method, Data Organization and data analysis.
  • Biodiversity,Classification-Aims and principles.
  • History of classification systems, Two-kingdom classification system, Three-kingdom classification system, Five-kingdom classification system.
  • General characteristics of Five-kingdom system and Binomial Nomenclature Etc Etc
title: Basic Concepts of Biology From Start to Finish - Complete
